fn_args_layout.description: Control the layout of arguments in a function

merge_derives.description: Merge multiple `#[derive(...)]` into a single one

print_misformatted_file_names.description: Prints the names of mismatched files that were formatted. Prints the names of files that would be formated when used with `--check` mode.

use_small_heuristics.description: Whether to use different formatting for items and expressions if they satisfy a heuristic notion of 'small'

use_try_shorthand.description: Replace uses of the try! macro by the ? shorthand

reorder_modules.description: Reorder module statements alphabetically in group

hard_tabs.description: Use tab characters for indentation, spaces for alignment

use_field_init_shorthand.description: Use field initialization shorthand if possible

reorder_imports.description: Reorder import and extern crate statements alphabetically

match_arm_leading_pipes.description: Determines whether leading pipes are emitted on match arms

force_explicit_abi.description: Always print the abi for extern items
